FASTG2Protlib ---------------------
FASTG2Protlib creates a validated protein FASTA library starting from FASTG output. The tool operates in two steps.
Step 1: Generate Peptides from FASTG ------------------------------------
Use the tool to generate peptides cleaved from putative proteins generated from a FASTG file.
Step 2: Generate Verified Protein Library -----------------------------------------
Use the tool to generate a verified protein library with MSGF+ verified peptides as input
